trans-unit.source: Represents an extension for a particular type of SharePoint project item.
trans-unit.target: 表示特定类型的 SharePoint 项目项的扩展。

trans-unit.source: Implement the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemTypeExtension> interface to define an extension that is loaded when an instance of a particular SharePoint project item type is added to a project or opened in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemTypeExtension>接口可定义特定的 SharePoint 项目项类型的实例添加到项目或在 Visual Studio 中打开时加载的扩展。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending SharePoint Project Items](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-sharepoint-project-items.md) and [How to: Create a SharePoint Project Item Extension](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-project-item-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 SharePoint 项目项](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-sharepoint-project-items.md)和[如何： 创建 SharePoint 项目项扩展](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-project-item-extension.md)。

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement this interface must include the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointProjectItemTypeAttribute> to be discovered by the project system.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口的类必须包括<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointProjectItemTypeAttribute>项目系统发现。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the project item type being extended.
trans-unit.target: 要扩展的项目项类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the project item type extension.
trans-unit.target: 初始化项目项类型扩展。
